trans-unit.source: List Blobs
trans-unit.target: List Blobs

trans-unit.source: List Blobs
trans-unit.target: List Blobs

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Blobs</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation enumerates the list of blobs under the specified container.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Blobs</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation enumerates the list of blobs under the specified container.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Blobs</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Blobs</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is recommended.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account:
trans-unit.target: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account:

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: Emulated Storage Service URI
trans-unit.target: Emulated Storage Service URI

trans-unit.source: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Blob service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10000</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:
trans-unit.target: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Blob service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10000</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <legacyLink xlink:href="f0e3acde-f019-4148-9544-34cf2ff27211" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Using the Azure Storage Emulator for Development and Testing</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <legacyLink xlink:href="f0e3acde-f019-4148-9544-34cf2ff27211" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Using the Azure Storage Emulator for Development and Testing</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: The following additional parameters may be specified on the URI.
trans-unit.target: The following additional parameters may be specified on the URI.

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Filters the results to return only blobs whose names begin with the specified prefix.
trans-unit.target: Filters the results to return only blobs whose names begin with the specified prefix.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: When the request includes this parameter, the operation returns a <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> element in the response body that acts as a placeholder for all blobs whose names begin with the same substring up to the appearance of the delimiter character.
trans-unit.target: When the request includes this parameter, the operation returns a <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> element in the response body that acts as a placeholder for all blobs whose names begin with the same substring up to the appearance of the delimiter character.

trans-unit.source: The delimiter may be a single character or a string.
trans-unit.target: The delimiter may be a single character or a string.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: A string value that identifies the portion of the list to be returned with the next list operation.
trans-unit.target: A string value that identifies the portion of the list to be returned with the next list operation.

trans-unit.source: The operation returns a marker value within the response body if the list returned was not complete.
trans-unit.target: The operation returns a marker value within the response body if the list returned was not complete.

trans-unit.source: The marker value may then be used in a subsequent call to request the next set of list items.
trans-unit.target: The marker value may then be used in a subsequent call to request the next set of list items.

trans-unit.source: The marker value is opaque to the client.
trans-unit.target: The marker value is opaque to the client.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of blobs to return, including all <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> elements.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum number of blobs to return, including all <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> elements.

trans-unit.source: If the request does not specify <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference> or specifies a value greater than 5,000, the server will return up to 5,000 items.
trans-unit.target: If the request does not specify <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference> or specifies a value greater than 5,000, the server will return up to 5,000 items.

trans-unit.source: Setting <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference> to a value less than or equal to zero results in error response code 400 (Bad Request).
trans-unit.target: Setting <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference> to a value less than or equal to zero results in error response code 400 (Bad Request).

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies one or more datasets to include in the response:
trans-unit.target: Specifies one or more datasets to include in the response:

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>snapshots</parameterReference>: Specifies that snapshots should be included in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>snapshots</parameterReference>: Specifies that snapshots should be included in the enumeration.

trans-unit.source: Snapshots are listed from oldest to newest in the response.
trans-unit.target: Snapshots are listed from oldest to newest in the response.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>metadata</parameterReference>: Specifies that blob metadata be returned in the response.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>metadata</parameterReference>: Specifies that blob metadata be returned in the response.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>uncommittedblobs</parameterReference>: Specifies that blobs for which blocks have been uploaded, but which have not been committed using <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List</link>, be included in the response.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>uncommittedblobs</parameterReference>: Specifies that blobs for which blocks have been uploaded, but which have not been committed using <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List</link>, be included in the response.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>copy</parameterReference>: Version 2012-02-12 and newer.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>copy</parameterReference>: Version 2012-02-12 and newer.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that metadata related to any current or previous <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation should be included in the response.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that metadata related to any current or previous <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation should be included in the response.

trans-unit.source: To specify more than one of these options on the URI, you must separate each option with a URL-encoded comma ("%82").
trans-unit.target: To specify more than one of these options on the URI, you must separate each option with a URL-encoded comma ("%82").

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="9ae411fa-1495-42a0-bc26-c41ebca9d5b8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for Blob Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="9ae411fa-1495-42a0-bc26-c41ebca9d5b8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for Blob Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.target: The following table describes required and optional request headers.

trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.

trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Required for all authenticated requests, optional for anonymous requests.
trans-unit.target: Required for all authenticated requests, optional for anonymous requests.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.
trans-unit.target: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.target: Sample Request

trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="35f34a0b-ab15-42da-9249-70cc51093a4f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Enumerating Blob Resources</link> for a sample request.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body in XML format.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body in XML format.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response header
trans-unit.target: Response header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Specifies the format in which the results are returned.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the format in which the results are returned.

trans-unit.source: Currently this value is <userInput>application/xml</userInput>.
trans-unit.target: Currently this value is <userInput>application/xml</userInput>.

trans-unit.source: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.
trans-unit.target: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the Blob service used to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the version of the Blob service used to execute the request.

trans-unit.source: This header is returned for requests made using version 2009-09-19 and newer.
trans-unit.target: This header is returned for requests made using version 2009-09-19 and newer.

trans-unit.source: This header is also returned for anonymous requests without a version specified if the container was marked for public access using the 2009-09-19 version of the Blob service.
trans-unit.target: This header is also returned for anonymous requests without a version specified if the container was marked for public access using the 2009-09-19 version of the Blob service.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: The format of the XML response is as follows.
trans-unit.target: The format of the XML response is as follows.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <languageKeyword>Prefix</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>Marker</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>MaxResults</languageKeyword>, and <languageKeyword>Delimiter</languageKeyword> elements are present only if they were specified on the request URI.
trans-unit.target: Note that the <languageKeyword>Prefix</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>Marker</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>MaxResults</languageKeyword>, and <languageKeyword>Delimiter</languageKeyword> elements are present only if they were specified on the request URI.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> element has a value only if the list results are not complete.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> element has a value only if the list results are not complete.

trans-unit.source: Snapshots, blob metadata, and uncommitted blobs are included in the response only if they are specified with the <parameterReference>include</parameterReference> parameter on the request URI.
trans-unit.target: Snapshots, blob metadata, and uncommitted blobs are included in the response only if they are specified with the <parameterReference>include</parameterReference> parameter on the request URI.

trans-unit.source: In version 2009-09-19 and newer, the blob's properties are encapsulated within a <languageKeyword>Properties</languageKeyword> element.
trans-unit.target: In version 2009-09-19 and newer, the blob's properties are encapsulated within a <languageKeyword>Properties</languageKeyword> element.

trans-unit.source: In version 2013-08-15 and newer, the <languageKeyword>EnumerationResults</languageKeyword> element contains a <languageKeyword>ServiceEndpoint</languageKeyword> attribute specifying the blob endpoint, and a <languageKeyword>ContainerName</languageKeyword> field specifying the name of the container.
trans-unit.target: In version 2013-08-15 and newer, the <languageKeyword>EnumerationResults</languageKeyword> element contains a <languageKeyword>ServiceEndpoint</languageKeyword> attribute specifying the blob endpoint, and a <languageKeyword>ContainerName</languageKeyword> field specifying the name of the container.

trans-unit.source: In previous versions these two attributes were combined together in the <languageKeyword>ContainerName</languageKeyword> field.
trans-unit.target: In previous versions these two attributes were combined together in the <languageKeyword>ContainerName</languageKeyword> field.

trans-unit.source: Also in version 2013-08-15 and newer, the <languageKeyword>Url</languageKeyword> element under <languageKeyword>Blob</languageKeyword> has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Also in version 2013-08-15 and newer, the <languageKeyword>Url</languageKeyword> element under <languageKeyword>Blob</languageKeyword> has been removed.

trans-unit.source: For version 2015-02-21 and above, <languageKeyword>List Blobs</languageKeyword> returns blobs of all types (block, page, and append blobs).
trans-unit.target: For version 2015-02-21 and above, <languageKeyword>List Blobs</languageKeyword> returns blobs of all types (block, page, and append blobs).

trans-unit.source: For versions from 2009-09-19 and newer but prior to version 2015-02-21, calling <languageKeyword>List Blobs</languageKeyword> on a container that includes append blobs will fail with status code 409 (FeatureVersionMismatch) if the result of listing contains an append blob.
trans-unit.target: For versions from 2009-09-19 and newer but prior to version 2015-02-21, calling <languageKeyword>List Blobs</languageKeyword> on a container that includes append blobs will fail with status code 409 (FeatureVersionMismatch) if the result of listing contains an append blob.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>LeaseState</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>LeaseDuration</languageKeyword> only appear in version 2012-02-12 and later.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>LeaseState</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>LeaseDuration</languageKeyword> only appear in version 2012-02-12 and later.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>CopyId</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>CopyStatus</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>CopySource</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>CopyProgress</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>CopyCompletionTime</languageKeyword>, and <languageKeyword>CopyStatusDescription</languageKeyword> only appear in version 2012-02-12 and later, when this operation includes the <parameterReference>include={copy}</parameterReference> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>CopyId</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>CopyStatus</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>CopySource</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>CopyProgress</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>CopyCompletionTime</languageKeyword>, and <languageKeyword>CopyStatusDescription</languageKeyword> only appear in version 2012-02-12 and later, when this operation includes the <parameterReference>include={copy}</parameterReference> parameter.

trans-unit.source: These elements do not appear if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a concluded <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: These elements do not appear if this blob has never been the destination in a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, or if this blob has been modified after a concluded <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation using <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Set Blob Properties</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, or <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Block List</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: These elements also do not appear with a blob created by <link xlink:href="b022aff3-053b-4bd7-9ebe-3f06e7e8f801" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Blob (REST API)</link> before version 2012-02-12.
trans-unit.target: These elements also do not appear with a blob created by <link xlink:href="b022aff3-053b-4bd7-9ebe-3f06e7e8f801" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Blob (REST API)</link> before version 2012-02-12.

trans-unit.source: Beginning with version 2009-09-19, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Blobs</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> returns the following renamed elements in the response body:
trans-unit.target: Beginning with version 2009-09-19, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Blobs</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> returns the following renamed elements in the response body:

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>Last-Modified</languageKeyword> (previously <languageKeyword>LastModified</languageKeyword>)
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>Last-Modified</languageKeyword> (previously <languageKeyword>LastModified</languageKeyword>)

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>Content-Length</languageKeyword> (previously <languageKeyword>Size</languageKeyword>)
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>Content-Length</languageKeyword> (previously <languageKeyword>Size</languageKeyword>)

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>Content-Type</languageKeyword> (previously <languageKeyword>ContentType</languageKeyword>)
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>Content-Type</languageKeyword> (previously <languageKeyword>ContentType</languageKeyword>)

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>Content-Encoding</languageKeyword> (previously <languageKeyword>ContentEncoding</languageKeyword>)
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>Content-Encoding</languageKeyword> (previously <languageKeyword>ContentEncoding</languageKeyword>)

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>Content-Language</languageKeyword> (previously <languageKeyword>ContentLanguage</languageKeyword>)
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>Content-Language</languageKeyword> (previously <languageKeyword>ContentLanguage</languageKeyword>)

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Content-MD5</languageKeyword> element appears for blobs created with version 2009-09-19 and newer.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Content-MD5</languageKeyword> element appears for blobs created with version 2009-09-19 and newer.

trans-unit.source: In version 2012-02-12 and newer, the Blob service calculates the <languageKeyword>Content-MD5</languageKeyword> value when you upload a blob using <link xlink:href="b213c30f-8d30-4718-ba77-2030f3009719" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Blob (REST API)</link>, but does not calculate this when you create a blob using <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List (REST API)</link>.
trans-unit.target: In version 2012-02-12 and newer, the Blob service calculates the <languageKeyword>Content-MD5</languageKeyword> value when you upload a blob using <link xlink:href="b213c30f-8d30-4718-ba77-2030f3009719" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Blob (REST API)</link>, but does not calculate this when you create a blob using <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List (REST API)</link>.

trans-unit.source: You can explicitly set the <languageKeyword>Content-MD5</languageKeyword> value when you create the blob, or by calling <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List (REST API)</link> or <link xlink:href="6e063a14-8ed5-4401-bd3b-ec3de4f7d74c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Properties (REST API)</link> operations.
trans-unit.target: You can explicitly set the <languageKeyword>Content-MD5</languageKeyword> value when you create the blob, or by calling <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List (REST API)</link> or <link xlink:href="6e063a14-8ed5-4401-bd3b-ec3de4f7d74c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Properties (REST API)</link> operations.

trans-unit.source: Sample Response
trans-unit.target: Sample Response

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="35f34a0b-ab15-42da-9249-70cc51093a4f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Enumerating Blob Resources</link> for a sample response.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="35f34a0b-ab15-42da-9249-70cc51093a4f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Enumerating Blob Resources</link> for a sample response.

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: If the container's access control list (ACL) is set to allow anonymous access to the container, any client may call this operation.
trans-unit.target: If the container's access control list (ACL) is set to allow anonymous access to the container, any client may call this operation.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this operation can be called by the account owner and by anyone with a Shared Access Signature that has permission to list blobs in a container.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, this operation can be called by the account owner and by anyone with a Shared Access Signature that has permission to list blobs in a container.

trans-unit.source: Blob Properties in the Response
trans-unit.target: Blob Properties in the Response

trans-unit.source: If you have requested that uncommitted blobs be included in the enumeration, note that some properties are not set until the blob is committed, so some properties may not be returned in the response.
trans-unit.target: If you have requested that uncommitted blobs be included in the enumeration, note that some properties are not set until the blob is committed, so some properties may not be returned in the response.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>x-ms-blob-sequence-number</languageKeyword> element is only returned for page blobs.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>x-ms-blob-sequence-number</languageKeyword> element is only returned for page blobs.

trans-unit.source: For page blobs, the value returned in the <languageKeyword>Content-Length</languageKeyword> element corresponds to the value of the blob's <parameterReference>x-ms-blob-content-length</parameterReference> header.
trans-unit.target: For page blobs, the value returned in the <languageKeyword>Content-Length</languageKeyword> element corresponds to the value of the blob's <parameterReference>x-ms-blob-content-length</parameterReference> header.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Content-MD5</languageKeyword> element appears in the response body only if it has been set on the blob using version 2009-09-19 or later.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Content-MD5</languageKeyword> element appears in the response body only if it has been set on the blob using version 2009-09-19 or later.

trans-unit.source: You can set the <parameterReference>Content-MD5</parameterReference> property when the blob is created or by calling <link xlink:href="6e063a14-8ed5-4401-bd3b-ec3de4f7d74c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Properties</link>.
trans-unit.target: You can set the <parameterReference>Content-MD5</parameterReference> property when the blob is created or by calling <link xlink:href="6e063a14-8ed5-4401-bd3b-ec3de4f7d74c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Properties</link>.

trans-unit.source: In version 2012-02-12 and newer, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> sets a block blob’s MD5 value even when the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request doesn’t include an MD5 header.
trans-unit.target: In version 2012-02-12 and newer, <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> sets a block blob’s MD5 value even when the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request doesn’t include an MD5 header.

trans-unit.source: Metadata in the Response
trans-unit.target: Metadata in the Response

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Metadata</languageKeyword> element is present only if the <parameterReference>include=metadata</parameterReference> parameter was specified on the URI.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Metadata</languageKeyword> element is present only if the <parameterReference>include=metadata</parameterReference> parameter was specified on the URI.

trans-unit.source: Within the <languageKeyword>Metadata</languageKeyword> element, the value of each name-value pair is listed within an element corresponding to the pair's name.
trans-unit.target: Within the <languageKeyword>Metadata</languageKeyword> element, the value of each name-value pair is listed within an element corresponding to the pair's name.

trans-unit.source: Note that metadata requested with this parameter must be stored in accordance with the naming restrictions imposed by the 2009-09-19 version of the Blob service.
trans-unit.target: Note that metadata requested with this parameter must be stored in accordance with the naming restrictions imposed by the 2009-09-19 version of the Blob service.

trans-unit.source: Beginning with this version, all metadata names must adhere to the naming conventions for <externalLink><linkText>C# identifiers</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa664670(VS.71).aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: Beginning with this version, all metadata names must adhere to the naming conventions for <externalLink><linkText>C# identifiers</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa664670(VS.71).aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: If a metadata name-value pair violates the naming restrictions enforced by the 2009-09-19 version, the response body indicates the problematic name within an <languageKeyword>x-ms-invalid-name</languageKeyword> element, as shown in the following XML fragment:
trans-unit.target: If a metadata name-value pair violates the naming restrictions enforced by the 2009-09-19 version, the response body indicates the problematic name within an <languageKeyword>x-ms-invalid-name</languageKeyword> element, as shown in the following XML fragment:

trans-unit.source: Snapshots in the Response
trans-unit.target: Snapshots in the Response

trans-unit.source: Snapshots are listed in the response only if the <parameterReference>include=snapshots</parameterReference> parameter was specified on the URI.
trans-unit.target: Snapshots are listed in the response only if the <parameterReference>include=snapshots</parameterReference> parameter was specified on the URI.

trans-unit.source: Snapshots listed in the response do not include the <languageKeyword>LeaseStatus</languageKeyword> element, as snapshots cannot have active leases.
trans-unit.target: Snapshots listed in the response do not include the <languageKeyword>LeaseStatus</languageKeyword> element, as snapshots cannot have active leases.

trans-unit.source: If you call <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Blobs</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> with a delimiter, you cannot also include snapshots in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: If you call <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Blobs</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> with a delimiter, you cannot also include snapshots in the enumeration.

trans-unit.source: A request that includes both returns an InvalidQueryParameter error (HTTP status code 400 – Bad Request).
trans-unit.target: A request that includes both returns an InvalidQueryParameter error (HTTP status code 400 – Bad Request).

trans-unit.source: Uncommitted Blobs in the Response
trans-unit.target: Uncommitted Blobs in the Response

trans-unit.source: Uncommitted blobs are listed in the response only if the <parameterReference>include=uncommittedblobs</parameterReference> parameter was specified on the URI.
trans-unit.target: Uncommitted blobs are listed in the response only if the <parameterReference>include=uncommittedblobs</parameterReference> parameter was specified on the URI.

trans-unit.source: Uncommitted blobs listed in the response do not include any of the following elements:
trans-unit.target: Uncommitted blobs listed in the response do not include any of the following elements:

trans-unit.source: Returning Result Sets Using a Marker Value
trans-unit.target: Returning Result Sets Using a Marker Value

trans-unit.source: If you specify a value for the <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference> parameter and the number of blobs to return exceeds this value, or exceeds the default value for <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference>, the response body will contain a <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> element that indicates the next blob to return on a subsequent request.
trans-unit.target: If you specify a value for the <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference> parameter and the number of blobs to return exceeds this value, or exceeds the default value for <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference>, the response body will contain a <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> element that indicates the next blob to return on a subsequent request.

trans-unit.source: To return the next set of items, specify the value of <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> as the marker parameter on the URI for the subsequent request.
trans-unit.target: To return the next set of items, specify the value of <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> as the marker parameter on the URI for the subsequent request.

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> should be treated as opaque.
trans-unit.target: Note that the value of <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> should be treated as opaque.

trans-unit.source: Using a Delimiter to Traverse the Blob Namespace
trans-unit.target: Using a Delimiter to Traverse the Blob Namespace

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>delimiter</parameterReference> parameter enables the caller to traverse the blob namespace by using a user-configured delimiter.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>delimiter</parameterReference> parameter enables the caller to traverse the blob namespace by using a user-configured delimiter.

trans-unit.source: In this way, you can traverse a virtual hierarchy of blobs as though it were a file system.
trans-unit.target: In this way, you can traverse a virtual hierarchy of blobs as though it were a file system.

trans-unit.source: The delimiter may be a single character or a string.
trans-unit.target: The delimiter may be a single character or a string.

trans-unit.source: When the request includes this parameter, the operation returns a <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> element.
trans-unit.target: When the request includes this parameter, the operation returns a <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> element.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> element is returned in place of all blobs whose names begin with the same substring up to the appearance of the delimiter character.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> element is returned in place of all blobs whose names begin with the same substring up to the appearance of the delimiter character.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> element is <placeholder>substring+delimiter</placeholder>, where <placeholder>substring</placeholder> is the common substring that begins one or more blob names, and <placeholder>delimiter</placeholder> is the value of the <placeholder>delimiter</placeholder> parameter.
trans-unit.target: The value of the <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> element is <placeholder>substring+delimiter</placeholder>, where <placeholder>substring</placeholder> is the common substring that begins one or more blob names, and <placeholder>delimiter</placeholder> is the value of the <placeholder>delimiter</placeholder> parameter.

trans-unit.source: You can use the value of <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> to make a subsequent call to list the blobs that begin with this prefix, by specifying the value of <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> for the <parameterReference>prefix</parameterReference> parameter on the request URI.
trans-unit.target: You can use the value of <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> to make a subsequent call to list the blobs that begin with this prefix, by specifying the value of <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> for the <parameterReference>prefix</parameterReference> parameter on the request URI.

trans-unit.source: Note that each <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> element returned counts toward the maximum result, just as each <languageKeyword>Blob</languageKeyword> element does.
trans-unit.target: Note that each <languageKeyword>BlobPrefix</languageKeyword> element returned counts toward the maximum result, just as each <languageKeyword>Blob</languageKeyword> element does.

trans-unit.source: Blobs are listed in alphabetical order in the response body, with upper-case letters listed first.
trans-unit.target: Blobs are listed in alphabetical order in the response body, with upper-case letters listed first.

trans-unit.source: Copy errors in CopyStatusDescription
trans-unit.target: Copy errors in CopyStatusDescription

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>CopyStatusDescription</languageKeyword> contains more information about the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> failure.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>CopyStatusDescription</languageKeyword> contains more information about the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> failure.

trans-unit.source: When a copy attempt fails and the Blob service is still retrying the operation, <languageKeyword>CopyStatus</languageKeyword> is set to <languageKeyword>pending</languageKeyword>, and the <languageKeyword>CopyStatusDescription</languageKeyword> text describes the failure that may have occurred during the last copy attempt.
trans-unit.target: When a copy attempt fails and the Blob service is still retrying the operation, <languageKeyword>CopyStatus</languageKeyword> is set to <languageKeyword>pending</languageKeyword>, and the <languageKeyword>CopyStatusDescription</languageKeyword> text describes the failure that may have occurred during the last copy attempt.

trans-unit.source: When <languageKeyword>CopyStatus</languageKeyword> is set to <languageKeyword>failed</languageKeyword>, the <languageKeyword>CopyStatusDescription</languageKeyword> text describes the error that caused the copy operation to fail.
trans-unit.target: When <languageKeyword>CopyStatus</languageKeyword> is set to <languageKeyword>failed</languageKeyword>, the <languageKeyword>CopyStatusDescription</languageKeyword> text describes the error that caused the copy operation to fail.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the three fields of every <languageKeyword>CopyStatusDescription</languageKeyword> value.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the three fields of every <languageKeyword>CopyStatusDescription</languageKeyword> value.

trans-unit.source: Component
trans-unit.target: Component

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: HTTP status code
trans-unit.target: HTTP status code

trans-unit.source: Standard 3-digit integer specifying the failure.
trans-unit.target: Standard 3-digit integer specifying the failure.

trans-unit.source: Error code
trans-unit.target: Error code

trans-unit.source: Keyword describing error that is provided by Azure in the <ErrorCode> element.
trans-unit.target: Keyword describing error that is provided by Azure in the <ErrorCode> element.

trans-unit.source: If no <ErrorCode> element appears, a keyword containing standard error text associated with the 3-digit HTTP status code in the HTTP specification is used.
trans-unit.target: If no <ErrorCode> element appears, a keyword containing standard error text associated with the 3-digit HTTP status code in the HTTP specification is used.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="1f47db15-ccb7-4ed8-81dd-a202d825327a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common REST API Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="1f47db15-ccb7-4ed8-81dd-a202d825327a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common REST API Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Information
trans-unit.target: Information

trans-unit.source: Detailed description of failure, in quotes.
trans-unit.target: Detailed description of failure, in quotes.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the <languageKeyword>CopyStatus</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>CopyStatusDescription</languageKeyword> values of common failure scenarios.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the <languageKeyword>CopyStatus</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>CopyStatusDescription</languageKeyword> values of common failure scenarios.

trans-unit.source: Description text shown here can change without warning, even without a version change, so do not rely on matching this exact text.
trans-unit.target: Description text shown here can change without warning, even without a version change, so do not rely on matching this exact text.

trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.target: CopyStatus value

trans-unit.target: CopyStatusDescription value

trans-unit.source: Copy operation completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: Copy operation completed successfully.

trans-unit.source: success
trans-unit.target: success

trans-unit.source: empty
trans-unit.target: empty

trans-unit.source: User aborted copy operation before it completed.
trans-unit.target: User aborted copy operation before it completed.

trans-unit.source: aborted
trans-unit.target: aborted

trans-unit.source: empty
trans-unit.target: empty

trans-unit.source: A failure occurred when reading from the source blob during a copy operation, but the operation will be retried.
trans-unit.target: A failure occurred when reading from the source blob during a copy operation, but the operation will be retried.

trans-unit.source: pending
trans-unit.target: pending

trans-unit.source: 502 BadGateway "Encountered a retryable error when reading the source.
trans-unit.target: 502 BadGateway "Encountered a retryable error when reading the source.

trans-unit.source: Will retry.
trans-unit.target: Will retry.

trans-unit.source: Time of failure: <time>"
trans-unit.target: Time of failure: <time>"

trans-unit.source: A failure occurred when writing to the destination blob of a copy operation, but the operation will be retried.
trans-unit.target: A failure occurred when writing to the destination blob of a copy operation, but the operation will be retried.

trans-unit.source: pending
trans-unit.target: pending

trans-unit.source: 500 InternalServerError "Encountered a retryable error.
trans-unit.target: 500 InternalServerError "Encountered a retryable error.

trans-unit.source: Will retry.
trans-unit.target: Will retry.

trans-unit.source: Time of failure: <time>"
trans-unit.target: Time of failure: <time>"

trans-unit.source: An unrecoverable failure occurred when reading from the source blob of a copy operation.
trans-unit.target: An unrecoverable failure occurred when reading from the source blob of a copy operation.

trans-unit.source: failed
trans-unit.target: failed

trans-unit.source: 404 ResourceNotFound "Copy failed when reading the source."
trans-unit.target: 404 ResourceNotFound "Copy failed when reading the source."

trans-unit.source: When reporting this underlying error, Azure returns <languageKeyword>ResourceNotFound</languageKeyword> in the <ErrorCode> element.
trans-unit.target: When reporting this underlying error, Azure returns <languageKeyword>ResourceNotFound</languageKeyword> in the <ErrorCode> element.

trans-unit.source: If no <ErrorCode> element appeared in the response, a standard string representation of the HTTP status such as <languageKeyword>NotFound</languageKeyword> would appear.
trans-unit.target: If no <ErrorCode> element appeared in the response, a standard string representation of the HTTP status such as <languageKeyword>NotFound</languageKeyword> would appear.

trans-unit.source: The timeout period limiting all copy operations elapsed.
trans-unit.target: The timeout period limiting all copy operations elapsed.

trans-unit.source: (Currently the timeout period is 2 weeks.)
trans-unit.target: (Currently the timeout period is 2 weeks.)

trans-unit.source: failed
trans-unit.target: failed

trans-unit.source: 500 OperationCancelled "The copy exceeded the maximum allowed time."
trans-unit.target: 500 OperationCancelled "The copy exceeded the maximum allowed time."

trans-unit.source: The copy operation failed too often when reading from the source, and didn’t meet a minimum ratio of attempts to successes.
trans-unit.target: The copy operation failed too often when reading from the source, and didn’t meet a minimum ratio of attempts to successes.

trans-unit.source: (This timeout prevents retrying a very poor source over 2 weeks before failing).
trans-unit.target: (This timeout prevents retrying a very poor source over 2 weeks before failing).
